about_the_game:
An Eternity Gone By is a time-based adventure across a series of strange worlds, filled with fun and imaginative monsters for you to face. Use Mirai’s telekinetic magic to launch the objects covering various worlds right back at the monsters inhabiting them… Revisit past levels decades later as you work your way to face the evil Spider Dragon: King of the Monsters.


It is said that every thirty years monsters descend upon Starblast Village. Everyone knows not to leave home during this event - everyone except for Mirai Starblazer.

That night, Mirai convinces her best friend Kako to sneak out and watch the stars. However, during their outing the two are ambushed by monsters and Kako is abducted and taken away to a mysterious world. Mirai ventures after her, not yet realizing just how long this journey will take…
It will take more than one attempt for Mirai to save Kako. Mirai might not have enough time on the first attempt. And with every failed attempt, time will pass and Mirai and the worlds she visits will change.

Follow Mirai through the different phases of her life. With age comes new perspectives as well as new abilities on the battlefield!

Mirai isn’t the type to attack with fireballs or lasers. Her weapons are the very objects that make up the world around her!



See an orange? You can throw it! Is there a giant cake at the top of a mountain? Hurl it down at your enemies! The world is your plaything, and it’s your only weapon against the waves of monsters you’ll be fighting.

All sorts of monsters inhabit this strange world Mirai finds herself in. Fight hordes of enemies to gain new skills that will help you on your journey!



Just don’t linger too long. The portal to the next world won’t stay open forever…


  • Interesting and colorful handcrafted worlds to explore
  • Dozens of unique and silly monsters to face
  • A unique telekinetic fighting style featuring 100+ different objects to control.
  • A tense race against the clock in every level.
  • Upgrades and new abilities just waiting to be unlocked
  • Alternate aged versions of worlds previously explored
  • Dynamic and fun voiced lines from the protagonist throughout gameplay
  • Beautifully hand drawn and fully voice acted cutscenes

short_description: Use your telekinetic powers to hurl watermelons, lamp posts, toilets and more at the monsters roaming this strange yet familiar world. You’ll take the role of Mirai: a young sorceress trying to save her friend from the monsters who’ve abducted her.
